text: Tumhi sanga, kaya mi tya allahasivaya dusaryala apala sahayyaka mitra banavu, jo akasanca va jaminica racayita ahe ani to sarvanna kha'u ghalato, tyala koni kha'u ghalata nahi. Tumhi sanga, mala ha adesa dila gela ahe ki mi tya sarvanta prathama rahave, jyanni allahasathi atmasamarpana kele ani anekesvaravadyampaiki kadhihi na rahave
